thread.title: Sean Hannity Attacks Joe Scarborough on Twitter For Daring to Criticize Trump Advisor | Mediaite
thread.title_full: Sean Hannity Attacks Joe Scarborough on Twitter For Daring to Criticize Trump Advisor | Mediaite

author: Alex Griswold
title: Sean Hannity Attacks Joe Scarborough on Twitter For Daring to Criticize Trump Advisor | Mediaite
text:
Sean Hannity Attacks Joe Scarborough on Twitter For Daring to Criticize Trump Advisor by Alex Griswold | 8:12 am, February 13th, 2017 
Fox News host and Donald Trump supporter Sean Hannity attacked MSNBC Morning Joe host and fellow conservative Joe Scarborough late Sunday for his constant criticism of Trump advisor Stephen Miller . 
Scarborough has been a Trump critic for the past few weeks, with both he and co-host Mika Brzezinski pulling no punches on Twitter after Miller’s widely-derided Sunday show circuit . I hope the president is talking about The Steve Miller Band and not that kid who embarrassed the White House this morning. #SweatsLikeMarco https://t.co/IqHiOXtE3V 
— Joe Scarborough (@JoeNBC) February 13, 2017 Miller was awful on every level. When I hear the White House praising him, they sound like they’re living in an alternative universe. https://t.co/rXkTTNJI4D 
— Joe Scarborough (@JoeNBC) February 13, 2017 The Steven Miller interviews this morning on all the Sunday shows were frightening! Sorry Mr President. No.. A really bad sign… 
— Mika Brzezinski (@morningmika) February 13, 2017 If the WH thinks that is a person they want to put out front-it’s beyond sad for our country. First KellyAnne now this..embarrassed for USA
